projects.title: Connect Me
projects.description: A chat application created with React.js and Firebase with sole objective to learn more about React.js and how firebase works with React.js.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: This is a challenge that I am doing from this website: https://www.frontendmentor.io/challenges/calculator-app-9lteq5N29

projects.title: Github User Finder
projects.description: This project is about creating an Web Application which would allow to find users on GitHub. This project was created from the reference of Brad Traversy JavaScript Course on Udemy. The background colour is the same as GitHub dark theme colour. All the designs were made using custom code with minimum usage of Skeleton and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Dinosaur game
projects.description: A fun little browser based dinosaur game.

projects.title: Noob Dev Official Site
projects.description: Source of code of the official Noob Dev (mz10ah) website. Built with NextJS.

projects.title: Noob Feedback App
projects.description: A small and simple feedback app created with NextJS, Prisma and PostgreSQL.
